content.description: Sit start on obvious jug. Power endurance on crimps and slopers trending up and right to casual top. One of the best at Horse Pens!
content.protection: There's two ways you can go about this problem. Have a pad on the steep boulder below you with someone dragging (or should I say "sliding") it up as you climb. Or have pads on the ground and a spotter sitting on the boulder to guide you to the pads if you fall.
content.location: Located on the far right side of The Slider Boulder.

content.description: Stand start on jugs and climb the tall boulder to some good holds at the top.
content.protection: Plenty of pads and spotters! Seriously sketchy
content.location: Located on The Slider Boulder left of Litz Pocket Problem just around the Arete. Starts on the ground about 8 feet below the other problems on this boulder.

content.description: Sit start low on jugs. Climb roof via shallow pockets to jug just right of tree. Finish same as Cuts Like a Knife.
content.protection: Crash pads and spotters!! Be careful on the first few moves, there's about an 8 foot dropoff if you don't make it out to boulder on the ground below you.
content.location: Located on The Slider boulder just left of Boomslang

content.description: Starts around the left side of the boulder by Message from the Masters and traverses the seam all the way to the original start of Cuts Like a Knife. Finish the same as Cuts.
content.protection: A few pads and a spotter for the top
content.location: Located on the Slider boulder. Traverses low along the seam all the way across

content.description: Sit start low on jug. Climb straight out face on crimping rail to huge jug. Continue up face, ending in large faint groove.
content.protection: You'll want a couple of crash pads for the topout.
content.location: Located on The Slider Boulder just left of Slider

content.description: Starts around the left side of the boulder near Message from the Masters. Traverses the seam into the original start of Boomslang. Finishes up the same.
content.protection: A couple pads and a spotter.
content.location: Located on the Slider Boulder left of Cuts Like a Knife and Right of Litz Pocket Problem

content.description: Sit start low in jugs. Climb out roof via undercling pocket and crimp to sloping edge. At jug, move right to finish same as Cuts Like a Knife.
content.protection: A couple of crash pads and a spotter for the top.
content.location: Boomslang is on The Slider boulder just left of Cuts Like a Knife.

content.description: Overhanging boulder with awesome crimps! Usually pretty crowded on a cold day.
